title: Email Access and Sync Issues
description: Troubleshooting Outlook, Gmail, and email client problems.

steps.title: Check Internet Connection
steps.instruction: Verify you have active internet connection. Try opening a website to confirm.

steps.title: Verify Credentials
steps.instruction: Ensure your email address and password are correct. Try logging in via webmail first.

steps.title: Check Server Settings
steps.instruction: For Outlook: File → Account Settings → Account Settings → Double-click your account → Verify incoming/outgoing server settings.

steps.title: Clear Email Cache
steps.instruction: Close email client completely. Delete cache files. Restart the application.

steps.title: Update Email Client
steps.instruction: Check for updates to your email application (Outlook, Thunderbird, etc.) and install them.
